tiled.io.xml

Class XMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiled.io.xml.XMLWriter

  • public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple helper class to write an XML file, based on http://www.xmlsoft.org/html/libxml-xmlwriter.html
